SENTENCE.STRING: , officially the Territory of Wallis and Futuna Islands (French: Wallis et Futuna or Territoire des îles Wallis et Futuna), is composed of two separate groups with three main volcanic tropical islands, which are separated 260 km:
*Wallis Islands (Uvea), in the north**Wallis Island (Uvea)*Hoorn Islands (Futuna Islands), in the south**Futuna**Alofi
are located in the South Pacific between Fiji and Samoa.
has been a French overseas collectivity (collectivité d'outre-mer, or COM).
had the status of a French overseas territory (territoire d'outre-mer, or TOM).
